caption: Organized Missisauga's New Year's Eve Celebration.  I planned the site area, collaborated with food vendors, performers and other vendors.  During the event I lead teams of volunteers to set up and operate the event.
position: Area Site Plan Manager and Supervisor for New Years Eve

caption: Organized a symposium for students to present their personal projects to the public

caption: Leading Waterloo's World Community Grid team, uWaterloo's largest distributed computing project leading to over 1000 years of distributed not for profit research computing time
